articles.title: BRICS Summit 2023 explainer: Russia’s push for a new common currency fails, India remains wary over China’s influence while 40+ countries apply to join - OpIndia
articles.description: As per reports, China’s ambassador to South Africa Chen Xiaodong told while speaking to the media, "I am confident that as two nations, two countries, we will have direct talks, direct meetings. I cannot say there is tension between us, but as neighbouring co…
articles.content: PM Modi will leave tomorrow to attend the BRICS Summit in South Africa’s Johannesburg. PM Modi will be there in the African nation for 3 days, from the 22nd to the 24th of August. Amid big speculatio… [+8237 chars]
